descriptions.description:
This requires the tablet to work correctly.
Stops alife, and: - If it's the first time you launch it (this session, the state isn't saved yet), you are given a wizard with language choice and EULA
After that (or if it's not the first launch), you're given the choice between: - Change language - Setup Wifi - Launch store update - Setup ALife (and exit this)
Still needs work!
